item.description:
Are there any objections to switching venues slightly. I originally wanted to go to this place - Teriyaki House - on Westminster but couldn't remember the name until I walked by last night. Then I realized I scheduled us for Sura across the street. Similar themed food, but TH has a bit more room for large parties. Sura is much smaller and if the majority would prefer we can switch back to this place but I don't know if they can fit a group our size. So I will find out if the majority prefer Sura.

 

Otherwise, we are on for Teriyaki (& Korean) House across the street. Get Japanese or Korean. I've eaten here once and had the bimbimbap and it was yum.

http://www.yelp.ca/biz/teriyaki-and-korean-house-providence

 

alternate: http://www.suraprovidence.com/

 

Please make sure to bring cash as we will not be splitting the check evenly. This is limited to the amount of people that is conducive to good conversation at a dining table. If more people join the waitlist, we could potentially get more than one table. Please make sure to keep your rsvp up to date as we'll make a reservation and that way waiting list people can join in.

 

Some of us will be heading over to Local 121 for Handsome Pete's monthly session of 80s music. If you can't make dinner, meet us there for drinks.
item.name: Dinner @ Teriyaki House downtown
